channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Continuously flooded road, 28th January
item.description:
This section of road floods all the time and is a hazard due to the number of drivers that drive down the middle of the road, thus being in oncoming traffics lane. There is clearly a flood issue. If nothing else it should be pumped when it gets particularly bad.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Old Gloucester Road, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: No rain in 24 hours - water has increased or remained the same

item.title: Potholes !, 28th January
item.description:
Potholes all over the turning into church road Terrible state damaging vehicles and a risk of turning off main road in time before other vehicles are into the back of you
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Lane, Leigh, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep Pothole, 28th January
item.description:
Potholes fixed last year already deeper than before having to drive around it causing damage to property Just outside Redruth bungalow
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Church Lane, Norton, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Flytipped furniture outside Morrisons Petrol Station, 28th January
item.description:
Flytipped furniture outside Morrisons Petrol Station

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Caernarvon Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree reaches overhead wires and hides view at bottom, 28th January
item.description:
The tree between 31 orchard Avenue and orchard court has two issues: 1) reaches the overhead wires and may affect them. 2) tree has basal shoots which severely hide view (when it has leaves) when driving out of nearby properties.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 31, Orchard Avenue, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
